TestCase.name: testAsyncAndSyncPythonFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b) FROM MyTable WHERE pyFunc1(a, c) > 0 AND asyncFunc2(b, c) > 0

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>(pyFunc1($0, $2), 0), >(asyncFunc2($1, $2), 0))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[asyncFunc1(a, b) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b], where=[AND(>(f0, 0), >(f1, 0))]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, pyFunc1(a, c) AS f0, f0 AS f1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, asyncFunc2(b, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionAsInputOfJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b) + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+(asyncFunc1($0, $1), 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[+(f0, 1) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b) FROM MyTable WHERE asyncFunc2(a, c) > 0
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(asyncFunc2($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[asyncFunc1(a, b) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b], where=[>(f0, 0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, asyncFunc2(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionMixedWithJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), c + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, +(c, 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionMixedWithJavaFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), c + 1 FROM MyTable WHERE asyncFunc2(a, c) > 0
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(asyncFunc2($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, +(c, 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, a, b], where=[>(f0, 0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, asyncFunc2(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionMixedWithSyncPythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), pyFunc1(b, c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[pyFunc1($1, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, pyFunc1(b, c) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionNotChainingWithSyncPythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, asyncFunc1(a, b)) + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+(pyFunc1($0, asyncFunc1($0, $1)), 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[+(f0, 1) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[pyFunc1(a, f0) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionWithLiteral
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, asyncFunc1(a, c), 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], EXPR$2=[asyncFunc1($0, $2)], EXPR$3=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, f0 AS EXPR$2, 1 AS EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, asyncFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionWithMultipleInputs
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), asyncFunc2(b, c), a + b FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[asyncFunc2($1, $2)], EXPR$2=[+($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, f1 AS EXPR$1, +(a, b) AS EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, f0, asyncFunc2(b, c) AS f1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testChainingAsyncPythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc3(asyncFunc2(a + asyncFunc1(a, c), b), c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc3(asyncFunc2(+($0, asyncFunc1($0, $2)), $1), $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[asyncFunc3(f0, c) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, asyncFunc2(f0, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, +(a, f0) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, a, asyncFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultipleAsyncPythonFunctions
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), asyncFunc2(b, c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[asyncFunc2($1, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, asyncFunc2(b, c) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testOnlyOneAsyncPythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[asyncFunc1(a, b) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testOnlyOneAsyncPythonFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable WHERE asyncFunc1(a, c) > 0
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(asyncFunc1($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b], where=[>(f0, 0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, asyncFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testReorderAsyncPythonCalc
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, asyncFunc1(a, c), b FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[asyncFunc1($0, $2)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, f0 AS EXPR$1, b]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, asyncFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSameAsyncPythonFunctionUsedInBothSelectAndWhere
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, asyncFunc1(a, c) FROM MyTable WHERE asyncFunc1(a, c) > 0
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[asyncFunc1($0, $2)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(asyncFunc1($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, f0 AS EXPR$1], where=[>(f0, 0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, asyncFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])
